Name: Russian Drunken Boxers
About the game: Russian Drunken Boxers is a fighting game (fight on red Square) with a cheerful musical accompaniment. You are waiting for the fights of drunk Russian boxers. Russian people love to fight in front of bears with balalaika! In fact, any Russian turns into a boxer when he drinks vodka. Feel like a drunk Russian boxer in this fun game. Fight alone against a drunken artificial intelligence or fight with a friend on the same keyboard! Key Features: - You fight near the Kremlin: - You can play against a friend on the same keyboard; - Bears with balalaikas in the background; - A drunken Vdvshnik with a Russian flag.
